content.p: Notwithstanding any other provisions of to the president, vice president, secretary, treasurer, or any other person holding any equivalent corporate office of any corporation subject to the provisions of to shall be personally and individually liable jointly and severally, for the taxes imposed under , and Neither the corporate dissolution or withdrawal of the corporation from the state nor the cessation of holding any corporate office shall discharge the liability imposed by this section. The personal and individual liability shall apply to each and every person holding a corporate office at the time the taxes become or became due.
